message: Let's be fair and split the money almost equally, with a slight advantage for me considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation is affecting you more, I'll give you a bit less
I understand the inflation puts me at a disadvantage. Let's meet in the middle - this offer is a compromise between our previous proposals.
Inflation is taking its toll, I'll take a bit more
This is getting us nowhere, Bob. I'm accepting a slight loss to end this negotiation quickly. It's still more than the inflation will cost me in the next round.
